comments.body:
If you want to `add_subdirectory(primitives)` unconditionally here, you can add `if(NOT root7) return(); endif()` in `primitives/CMakeLists.txt`.

Why all the moving stuff around, though?
OK thanks - not sure it adds much? If you prefer this then let me know and I'll change this in an upcoming PR!

I have no particular preference, just pointing out options. As for getting rid of object libraries, go for it :smiley: If you want, we can use these new developments to create and test a new `ROOT_STANDARD_LIBRARY_PACKAGE()` macro that will pick up include directories and generate dictionaries automatically. What do you think about this idea? Hopefully we end up with something like [this](https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/shape/CMakeLists.txt) for our modules too.
